result.reason: Valid enhancement request for silent/enterprise deployments needing control over desktop shortcut creation via MSI property
result.approach: Add an MSI public property (e.g. INSTALLDESKTOPSHORTCUT=1 default) that gates the desktop shortcut component, allowing admins to suppress it via msiexec /i ... INSTALLDESKTOPSHORTCUT=0

attempts.raw_output:
Looking at this issue - it's a feature request for an MSI installer switch to skip creating desktop shortcuts for all users.
